table-entry.name: CLIENT
table-entry.col-data: id varchar(200) primary key,name varchar(200),balance real

table-entry.name: STOCK_ITEM
table-entry.col-data: id varchar(200) primary key,title varchar(200),rentPrice real

table-entry.name: MOVIE
table-entry.col-data: id varchar(200) primary key,stockId varchar(200), FOREIGN KEY(stockId) REFERENCES STOCK_ITEM(id)

table-entry.name: RENTED_ITEM
table-entry.col-data: id varchar(200) primary key,itemId varchar(200),clientId varchar(200),dueDate varchar(255), FOREIGN KEY(itemId) REFERENCES STOCK_ITEM(id), FOREIGN KEY(clientId) REFERENCES CLIENT(id)
